name: Project Retro Ninja
description:
Controls: 

Left arrow - Move left
Right arrow - Move right
Up arrow - Jump
A - Attack
D - Dash (you became invulnerable when dashing)
E - Enter on doors 
P - Pause
ESC - Exit to stage select screen
S - Clone attack (you need to buy it first)

Please give your feedback and follow us :)
